title: Urfwick not working
body:
Yeah the title says it all. I bought Urfwick, tried to select it and it said it was locked. Got put as big bad warwick instead. Not sure what else to do.

Edit: Yes it says I own it when I go to the store page.

replies.body: I do see that Urfwick was successfully obtained.  You may need to relog in case of a syncing issue.  Grats!

I too am having this issue just to highlight this may be a more reoccurring bug. Submitted a Support Ticket about it. Its been about 2 or so days since I purchased it and have logged in and out multiple times with multiple attempts to use the skin and still cannot use it. Help!

> [{quoted}](name=YiiiiRoy Jenkins,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=25dMmwkW,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-11-15T23:36:15.958+0000)
>
> I too am having this issue just to highlight this may be a more reoccurring bug. Submitted a Support Ticket about it. Its been about 2 or so days since I purchased it and have logged in and out multiple times with multiple attempts to use the skin and still cannot use it. Help!

I'm also having this issue.

I SOLVED THE ISSUE!

Keep scrolling through the skins and you will see Urfwick. Riot has the Urf the manatee skin AND Urfwick with the same splsh art. if you go to the last skin you will see it.

I SOLVED THE ISSUE!

Keep scrolling through the skins and you will see Urfwick. Riot has the Urf the manatee skin AND Urfwick with the same splsh art. if you go to the last skin you will see it.
I'm having the exact same issue, bought the skin, even restarted the client and waited like a good 10 minutes before playing a game, skin still locked.

Okay so i figured out what happened, riot in all it's glory decided to keep the skin selection for the old "Urf the manatee", rather than just make that the skin you unlock you get a new skin "Urfwick" it is the exact same art for "Urf the manatee", you need to look through your skins to find the skin "Urfwick" it is the same art as "Urf the manatee" but technically a different skin.
